Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that uses a string and two cups to communicate sound between two students.
The student can draw an explanation of how sound travels through the string from one student to the other.
The student can depict the materials used, showing only the provided resources such as string and cups.
The student can represent how the device allows communication over a distance.
The student can include additional features to demonstrate how this string telephone helps people send and receive information.
